robot

Class GameRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.Robot
      • robot.GameRobot

  • public class GameRobot
extends Robot
    This class represents our actual implementation of the robot class, we may have multiple implementations if a specific implementation fails to pass all of our tests later on.
